Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "All of you present are Commandants who have passed the APUS mock training with flying colors, so I'll cut to the chase.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What awaits you next is an actual combat mission.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'As you all know, Babylonia has been engaged in tactical warfare with forces on the surface...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And the effort to reclaim deserted urban areas in good conditions is well underway...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'So, the next step is to send all of you to areas near where those forces are based.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'There you will find strongholds on the brink of collapsing. And those forces are too preoccupied to do anything about them.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'To use Babylonia as a bridge to reconnect the human strongholds driven apart by the virus.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's it. Celica will have additional information regarding the strongholds you've been assigned to. Dismissed!", 4: '3'}
